DOC.brief_summary: Patients Diabetes Mellitus Type 1 use electronic self-help tool typically register large amount data disease . The study intend see give advance feedback data improve blood glucose management .
DOC.detailed_description: All patient give access mobile phone diabetes diary know Few Touch Application ( FTA ) instal . They may use either compatible Android handset , provide handset . The study use delayed start design . Participants randomize two group , get access module `` Diastat '' 4 12 week post-enrollment respectively . Each group use FTA Diastat 8 week post-intervention ( i.e . access Diastat ) . Diastat module within FTA provide data-driven feedback patient use data . This module base data record previous trial [ 1 ] . Three submodules part Diastat ; Periodicity detection visualization , multiscale trend detection base c-SiZer algorithm [ 2 ] , situation match insulin dosage [ 3 ] . 1 . Skrøvseth SO et al , Diabetes Technol Ther ( 2012 ) 2 . Skrøvseth SO et al , PLoS ONE ( 2012 ) 3 . Skrøvseth SO et al , Accepted Advanced Technologies Treatments Diabetes , Paris , France , 2013 .
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis Diabetes Mellitus type 1 least one year . Age 18 year Has basic familiarity mobile phone , use mobile phone daily basis . Severe complication due diabetes . Unable understand conform guideline present phone 's software .
